author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Stamps.Com Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $2.15
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Stamps.Com Inc:
* STAMPS.COM REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $4.68
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.15 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 25 PERCENT TO $132.5 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE ABOUT $7.09 TO $8.04
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE ABOUT $530 MILLION TO $560 MILLION * EXPECT 2018 NON-GAAP ADJUSTED INCOME PER FULLY DILUTED SHARE TO BE IN A RANGE OF $8.80 TO $9.80
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.72, REVENUE VIEW $120.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $8.33, REVENUE VIEW $534.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
